item.title: ~~Adding commands to your server~~
item.dc:creator: @Eddie12390 Eddie12390
item.description:
@Eddie12390 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“what you type to activate the tele”) && playerRights >= 1) // Player Rights can be changed
{
if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{
teleportToX = X Coordinates Go here;
teleportToY = Y Coordinates Go here;
heightLevel = Heigh above ground go here;
sendMessage(“Optional, message to send goes in these quots”);
}
}

Read full topic
